ygData.messageBody:
Some replies follows.


At 02:12 25/05/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
>> From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
>>

>
>> - Poison. Meditating is NOT sitting. I wish someone told me that before.
>> Just figured it out after I saw the poison effect wore off and watched the
>> hp grows.
>
>When you meditate, you *do* sit, so I'm not sure what this statement means.


It does means =you do not sit=!. For poison's purpose anyway. Sitting hp
recover rating is 2hp/tick an help flushing poison out of system faster.
Meditating rate is 1hp/tick and doesn't help with poison. Try it, find out
by yourself.

>
>> - Jewelry. Jewel's prices are related to the level of one's skill. At
>> jewelry 30 I sold rose quartz wedding ring at 133sp (+cp), made 31 and
>> price went up 152 (+cp). Almost no loss :P. I noticed something similar
>> earlier (I worked lvl 9-13 on my own before buying the rest of the lvls
>> from a teacher). So maybe jewelry is not so bugged in the first place. If
>> anyone else can confirm/infirm this I would appreciate (test sales before
>> and after a 10th is reached)
>
>Most likely you just sold to a different vendor that liked you better. If
>this is not the case, it would be a MUCH needed change. Another would be to
>raise the benefit of the enchantment based on your jewelcraft skill, so
>someone with a skill of 100 could make a MUCH better item than someone at a
>skill of 30.

After working my way up to lvl 31, I would be a complete twit not to sell
only at best possible price, I only like losing gp that much. Both sales
were made at the same place/vendor/time/patch version (if you need to know
the routine, I buy 4 silvers bars in one place (WF). Go play/hunt in
EC/Befallen and once I get enough money for the need of the day sell with
the Erudite vendor in EC (Im Erudite too). Buy one gem/sale the result if
any/buy another one until out of money or silver bars)...Plus, as said
before, I noticed something similar between 10 and 11 but at the time
figured it as an oddity.

Alliance : It never says in the rules it is the spell's purpose. Please
state your sources. At this moment I have to test if it helps on quests/talks.

Jade : Just to make sure after new patch, I went through all vendors in
mage guild in Freeport. No one has any jade for sale. Most likely it was
due to player's loot.

Ibnabeth / Karana
